title: Honey roast duck with cabbage, smoked bacon, roast garlic, girolle mushrooms and spiced jus
description: Duck works really well with Chinese five-spice, and this is such an easy way to cook it. Just drop the complicated sauce and presentation if you're short of time.
ingredients: 1kg/2lb 4oz duck carcasses, chopped into small pieces
1 large onion, cut into thick rings
4 x 180g/6oz duck breasts, chilled in the refrigerator
12 garlic cloves, peeled and left whole
2 tbsp clear honey mixed with pinch of Chinese five-spice powder
½ celeriac, peeled, finely chopped and blanched
salt and freshly ground black pepper
